content_filter.description: Content filter may be: disabled 0, no role 1 or all members 2

default_notifications.description: True for only @mentions, true for all messages

icon_url.description: The url of the icon of the server

id.description: The ID of the server. Used for identification purpose internally

inactive_channel.description: The afk voice channel of the server

inactive_timeout.description: Timeout to be moved to afk channel

system_message_channel.description: Where member join and nitro boost messages will go

verification_level.description: Verification level may be: none 0, low 1, medium 2, high 3, extreme 4

voice_region.description: The voice region of the server
